title: Hexo NexT主题配置
content:
### 摘要

官方公告：auto_excerpt 可以自动截断文章内容作为摘要。此功能不是一个 Hexo 主题应当负责的，这为主题的维护者带来了太大压力。自 7.6.0 版本开始，此功能被移除，请自行安装第三方插件，或阅读 Hexo 有关文档。当然，我们仍然建议通过 `<!-- more -->` 来精确控制 Read More 的位置。<!-- more -->

### 回到顶部

在`\blog\_config.next.yml`中修改`back2top`。

### 头像形状

在`\blog\_config.next.yml`修改。

```yaml
# Sidebar Avatar
avatar:
  # Replace the default image and set the url here.
  url: /images/avatar.jpg #头像文件
  # If true, the avatar will be displayed in circle.
  rounded: true #true表示圆形
  # If true, the avatar will be rotated with the cursor.
  rotated: false
```

### 头像大小

在`\blog\node_modules\hexo-theme-next\source\css\_common\outline\sidebar\sidebar-author.styl`修改。

```stylus
.site-author-image {
  border: $site-author-image-border-width solid $site-author-image-border-color;
  max-width: 2cm; #头像的直径
  padding: 2px;
```

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).<!--more-->

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
